---
title: "Alpha Data Tutorial"
output: pdf_document
---

```{r}
library(alphavantager)

data=av_get("NASDAQ:^IXIC", av_fun = "TIME_SERIES_INTRADAY", interval = "5min", outputsize = "full")

write.csv(data,"~/NASDAQ:^IXIC.csv", row.names = T) #saves to onedrive documents
```
